img_above_text:
Then, you'll want to go over to that collection of rocks. When you approach, it will transform into your first miniboss of the region, which is the Flint Vanguard.
### Don't Miss This Spirit!
img_below_text:
Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
### Yaoguai Chief - Flint Vanguard

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, atmospheric scene featuring a pathway leading to a grand, ornate structure resembling a temple, surrounded by rocky terrain. A lone figure dressed in white stands near a large, spherical object, creating a sense of anticipation. This setting likely represents the approach to the Flint Vanguard miniboss, as mentioned in the preceding text, and serves as a key narrative moment in the walkthrough.
